translation.text: Consult now or by appointment from your computer or using our application, available on the App Store and Google Play
translation.text1: from your computer or using our application,
translation.order_desc: More than 1,500 doctors and more than 50 different specializations
translation.first_order: Appointment at a time convenient for you, without a visit to the clinic
translation.second_order: Doctors with more than 8 years of experience
translation.third_order: We will clearly explain the cause of the disease and give detailed recommendations
translation.info: Online consultations of specialist doctors, what this service offers.
translation.info2: In our web and mobile application you will find expert doctors who will provide you with personalized care online 24/7
